pullRequest.title: Update multi-valued user claims independently from non-multi-valued claims
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Fix for wso2/product-is#8135
Support multi-valued claim updates independently from single-valued claims.
Related PRs
Public fix for wso2-support/carbon-kernel#984 and wso2-support/carbon-kernel#988
